body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Classic Cap Sleeve Wrap Dress (Available in Plus Size)
features: CLASSIC FIT: Close-but-comfortable fit with easy movement.
MATTE JERSEY: Soft, compact midweight jersey with a beautiful hand and drape. This fabric keeps you cool and polished all year round.

CLASSIC WRAP DRESS: This figure-flattering wrap dress is perfect for all occasions whether at work, out to dinner with friends, or going to an event. Style back to Amazon Essential's Women's Two Strap Heeled Sandals or dress down with a pair of flats.

DETAILS: Features an adjustable wrap closure with interior hidden button providing a secure fit for all-day wear. Pleat detail at the waist creates a flattering and beautiful drape. Deep v-neck and short cap sleeves.
LENGTH: 40 1/2" from side neck on US size S.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,084 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #208 in Women's Casual Dresses

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality & price
reviews.reviewText: I got a Large -Red & Black Print. I am 5' Large or 12. 36C. I was very pleased with the heavy weight of this dress. The heavy being not light weight, but weighty quality of the material. Not sheer, it is silky, but not slippery, the cut & shape is beautiful. Got what I wanted! If you have a belly like me, or are apple shaped you will need to size up... if you are large chested size up!!! I forgot there was a button and just pulled it on over my head, the button stayed closed.. The bottom front was weird until I figured out I had to adjust the waist to get the hem to balance in front...You adjust the fit where you tie it., at the waist, adjust by reaching under the flap waist part and find the tie going toward the back on your right and pull on the shorter tie on your left to make it longer. You should end up with a longer tie. Length, if you are 5' the dress is around 2" below the knee, but not like you are wearing a tea length dress. I really like it and if I wore dresses I would buy 3 of these, but I only need one for a wedding. In my opinion the true wrap dress is one of the best inventions, for women by a woman ever! Because you are not locked into a waist size, it is adjustable!! If I could afford a real Diane Von Furstenberg dress, I wold jump on it!. Thank you Amazon Essentials, I love the "Try Before You Buy" I didn't need 7 days after I got it, I needed 7 minutes to put it on & buy it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this dress last min before a wedding. I’m 5’1 and 128 lbs. I am large on top so ordered a med going by some other reviews. It fit perfectly but I did pin the front because it showed my bra. A small may have fit better, but this was still perfect. It never wrinkled the entire night. Some reviews said the button underneath where the belt is came unbuttoned but mine didn’t. The material is perfect. Not too thin and not too thick. It is a very flattering fit. I received a lot of compliments. I plan on ordering one in black. I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Flattering
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a XXL and I normally wear between a size 16-18 depending on the item. The dress fits well in the bust but is a little loose everywhere else. I did not size down because I was afraid the next size smaller would be too small. Anyway, the fabric is nice and breathable, but not too thin - very comfortable. It was flattering at my waist with the gathered material, but the button hole that holds the wrap together was too large and a little awkward - has a tendency to slip out - the ties are actually enough to hold the dress together securely, but it would be better if the button closure was replaced with a clasp instead. The price for this dress is great, especially for the quality of the fabric and the classic look. I wasn't sure if I liked the "sleeves" - IMO, I think this dress would actually look best on me with a light cardigan or shrug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, feels great!
reviews.reviewText: Good quality product for reasonable cost.Very pleased with how it looks on me. Very comfortable to wear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Confusing when putting on, but worth it!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dress the day before and it arrived the day of my friend’s wedding reception. I have lost over 40 pounds and didn’t have anything to wear and this was a last minute buy and I was hoping for the best. Thankfully, this dress met my expectations and beyond! I will admit when I was putting it on, I was quite confused on how the dress actually wrapped but there’s a hole meant to pull the band thru and tie to the other side of the band. The button to keep the band and sides of the dress together are a perfect safety addition so you’re not depending solely only your tying skills. Overall great buy and great price. It fit a little tight in the arms but nothing I didn’t get over. If you’re looking for a dress to hide a little bit of extra you have this is it. Fits like a glove! I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a cute dress, it was pretty heavy compared to other dresses. It was soft and flattering in the tummy section. The color was true to images online. I ordered a large, I'm about 5'1 and 170 lbs. I didn't like how on the sides/back it shows the imperfections of my body but that could easily be fixed with a good body shaper. I did end up returning this dress because it just wasnt the one I'm looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not for my body type but GORGEOUS!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the wrap dress in leopard print. I did return it because I’m just too heavy from the side view, around my waist and back. But that wasn’t the dresses fault, lol. I hated returning this, as I looked great from the front. This dress is beautiful, stretchy , heavier quality drapey knit fabric. Looks just like pic and colors are beautiful. Nicely sewn. But what I liked best is it fits and hangs well, which means it was well draped ( the pattern) when it was being designed. I know because I was in the fashion business for years and know patternmaking /draping myself! Fit as expected otherwise. I wear XL and felt it was correct. Don’t hesitate to try this if you have a fairly good waist, it’s sexy and cute. If I ever lose some weight, I’ll definitely reorder it lol.
Material is beautiful and drapes well on the body and is very figure flattering. Sizing is accurate . Love it!

Reçue ce matin très rapidement pour les fêtes elle est parfaite, finition très soignée, elle tombe parfaitement, le tissu est de bonne qualité, franchement bluffée par le rapport qualité prix ! Je mesure 164 cm pour 59kg j’ai pris comme d’habitude taille S et elle est pile poil , même au niveau du décolleté, n’ayant pas une forte poitrine j’avais la crainte que ça baille un peu mais pas du tout vraiment bien ajustée, avec quelques accessoires, de jolis collants et escarpins, ma tenue de fêtes est top sans un gros budget. Je recommande vivement cette robe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was on the fence about this dress for a while but the price dropped so I decided to go for it.Fits great. The material is lovely and thick so the dress hangs well. Such good quality for the price. Like the blue n white so much I immediately ordered the black n red!

Ich schreibe selten Rezensionen, aber diese Kleid verdient es.War zuerst skeptisch wegen des Materials. Bin aber sehr positiv überrascht! Es ist ein gut fallender, nicht zu dünner Stoff. Der Schnitt des Kleides ist sensationell, kaschiert auch ein kleines Bäuchlein.Dekollete schließt gut, auch bei Körbchen D.

Es un vestido muy cómodo, se adapta muy bien al cuerpo y favorece. Me ha gustado la calidad de la tela, pensé que podría ser finita y no: tiene cuerpo, pesa, lo que hace que no se pegue, no se deforme y lo mejor.. no necesita plancha.
